cards.title: Albert Einstein
cards.description: Theoretical physicist known for the theory of relativity.

cards.title: Marie Curie
cards.description: Pioneering physicist and chemist who conducted research on radioactivity.

cards.title: Isaac Newton
cards.description: Mathematician, physicist, astronomer, and author who is widely recognized as one of the most influential scientists of all time.

cards.title: Niels Bohr
cards.description: Physicist who made foundational contributions to understanding atomic structure and quantum theory.

cards.title: Cinderella
cards.description: The story of a young girl who overcomes her hardships with the help of magic.

cards.title: Snow White
cards.description: The classic tale of a princess who befriends seven dwarfs to escape the evil queen.

cards.title: Ariel
cards.description: A mermaid princess who dreams of living on land and falls in love with a human prince.

cards.title: Belle
cards.description: A young woman who finds herself falling in love with a Beast, who is cursed to live as a monster.
